channel.title: CVE Feed for EG Secure Solutions Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for EG Secure Solutions Inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-37881|2024-08-02T03:57:39.870Z -- eg%20secure%20solutions%20inc. -- siteguard%20wp%20plugin
item.description: SiteGuard WP Plugin provides a functionality to customize the path to the login page wp-login.php and implements a measure to avoid redirection from other URLs. However, SiteGuard WP Plugin versions prior to 1.7.7 missed to implement a measure to avoid redirection from wp-register.php. As a result, the customized path to the login page may be exposed.
